Generation VIII.Sword: It feeds on seaweed, using its teeth to scrape it off rocks. Electric current flows from the tips of its spines.
Generation VIII.Shield: It stores electricity in each spine. Even if one gets broken off, it still continues to emit electricity for at least three hours.

Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon generates electricity when it digests food. It uses its five hard teeth to scrape seaweed off surfaces and eat it.
Generation IX.Violet: This Pokémon is so timid that even brushing against seaweed will make it discharge electricity in surprise. Its lips do not conduct electricity.

Generation VIII.Sword: Route 9 Giant's Mirror , Lake of Outrage , Motostoke Riverbank ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Route 9 Giant's Mirror , Lake of Outrage , Motostoke Riverbank ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Courageous Cavern , Loop Lagoon Frigid Sea (walking and Surfing ) Frostpoint Field , Giant's Bed , Three-Point Pass , Frigid Sea , Ballimere Lake ( Max Raid Battle ) Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure )
